items.sentence: I\'m sorry, I already have another commitment.
Tom says that he has to go to Boston tomorrow.
Tom seemed surprised when I told him about it.
Tom seems to be expecting something to happen.
Tom seldom, if ever, complains about anything.
Our neighbors were forced to sell their house.
She came downstairs with a letter in her hand.
Who\'s that boy playing the guitar over there?
Why didn\'t anyone tell me about this earlier?
Why didn\'t you tell me that you were engaged?
Why don\'t we try going to Boston this summer?
Why don\'t you ask Tom to help you pull weeds?
Tom realized Mary was probably getting hungry.
Tom realized he could be making a big mistake.
Tom received a brutal beating from his father.
Tom recognized three of the names on the list.
Tom and Mary announced their engagement today.
Tom and Mary are both very competent teachers.
Tom and Mary are getting married next weekend.
Tom and Mary are waiting at the park entrance.
